name: feeds-fun
description: feeds.fun is a self-hosted RSS reading and aggregation tool focused on playful UX. It lets users subscribe to feeds, mark items as read, and browse posts in a colorful interface while keeping everything under their own control.
features: RSS Reading: Playful user experience, Colorful interface, Mark as read functionality. Fun feed browsing.
Feed Aggregation: Subscribe to multiple sources. Centralized content.
Self-Hosted: Your data, your control. Privacy-first approach.
Modern UI: Engaging design. Enjoyable reading experience.
Visual Feed Cards: Beautiful content presentation. Eye-catching layout.
Quick Actions: Swipe gestures and shortcuts. Efficient navigation.
Feed Organization: Group and categorize. Structured reading.
Responsive Design: Works on all devices. Mobile-optimized.
Search: Find articles quickly. Powerful filtering.
